Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_LEFT"); GameTooltip:SetText(this.tooltip);
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_CURSOR"); GameTooltip:SetText("Toggle the minimap button by clicking here");
AsmoMODExplainText:AddMessage("\n BG Auto Release, Auto Repair, Auto Herb/Mine, Auto Overpower, Auto Riposte, Auto Execute, Auto NSHeal \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enable/Disable each effect that auto break acts upon by clicking here \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enable/Disable auto accept of groups/summons/ressurects/BG queues as well as set their delay timers, if applicable \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enable/Disable mana conservation as well as mana conservation options \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enable/Disable swiftmend targets and auto swiftmend options \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODBreakOpsExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Dsiables auto-break totally \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODBreakOpsExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables auto break out of fear effects (Fear, Psychic Scream, etc.)\n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODBreakOpsExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables auto break out of stun effects (Cheapshot, Bash, etc.)\n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODBreakOpsExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables auto break out of charm effects (Mind Control, Seduction, etc.)\n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODBreakOpsExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables auto break out of polymorph effects \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODBreakOpsExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables auto break out of immobilization effects (Root, Frost Nova, etc.)\n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODBreakOpsExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables auto break out of impairment effects (Crippling Poison, Hamstring, etc.) \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODBreakOpsExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables use of Escape Artist to break out of impair effects \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODBreakOpsExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables use of Berserker Rage to break out of fear effects/gouge \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODBreakOpsExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables use of Wotf to break out of fear/charm/sleep effects \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODBreakOpsExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables use of Stoneform to break out of crippling poison \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODAcceptExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables automatic acceptance of ressurects \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODAcceptExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables automatic acceptance of summons \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODAcceptExplainText:AddMessage("\n Sets the time (In seconds) the mod will wait before automatically accepting a summon (0 for instant accept) \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODAcceptExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables automatically joining BGs \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODAcceptExplainText:AddMessage("\n Sets the time (In seconds) the mod will wait before automatically joining a battleground (0 for instant accept) \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODAcceptExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Dsiables automatic acceptance of group invites \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODAcceptExplainText:AddMessage("\n If enabled Auto Group will only accept invite requests from friends or guildmates \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODGeneralExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables automatically releasing in BGs \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODGeneralExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables automatic repair of all items when you talk to merchants \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODGeneralExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables automatic casting of find herbs/minerals, cannot be enabled with find treasure\n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODGeneralExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables automatic casting of find treasure, cannot be enabled with find herbs/minerals\n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODGeneralExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Dsiables automatic use of overpower Note: Do NOT enable unless you have overpower on one of your hotbars \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODGeneralExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Dsiables automatic use of riposte Note: Do NOT enable unless you have riposte on one of your hotbars \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODGeneralExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Dsiables automatic use of Counterattack Note: Do NOT enable unless you have Counterattack on one of your hotbars \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODGeneralExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Dsiables automatic use of execute Note: Enable ONLY if you are a warrior \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODGeneralExplainText:AddMessage("\n Sets the rage ceiling for execute. Execute will not cast if you have more rage than this value \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );

AsmoMODGeneralExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Dsiables automatic use of NSHeal if you go below a certain health percentage: Enable ONLY if you are a druid or shaman with NS \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODGeneralExplainText:AddMessage("\n If Enabled, Auto - Nsheal will cast only if the player is in combat \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODGeneralExplainText:AddMessage("\n Sets the percentage of health at which nsheal with automatically cast: Enable ONLY if you are a shaman or druid \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODConserveExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Dsiables automatic cancelling of heals if your target is above a specified percentage of life\n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODConserveExplainText:AddMessage("\n Spells will cancel if your target has more than this set percentage: Enable ONLY if you are a healer \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );

AsmoMODConserveExplainText:AddMessage("\n Set this to the time at which you want your spell cancels to be detected before the spell completes. IE: Set it to 0.3 and your spells can ONLY be cancelled if they are within 0.3s of completing the cast \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );

AsmoMODSwiftExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables automatic casting of swiftmend on anyone if their health goes below a set percentage, regardless of time left on your HoTs\n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODSwiftExplainText:AddMessage("\n Percentage that emergency swiftmend triggers at \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );

AsmoMODSwiftExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables automatic casting of swiftmend on anyone whose HoT is about to expire and whose health is below a set percentage \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODSwiftExplainText:AddMessage("\n Percentage that swiftmend conserve triggers at, it will only trigger if 3 seconds or less are left on your HoT \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODSwiftExplainText:AddMessage("\n Enables or Disables swiftmend monitor parsing, if disabled only emergency swiftmend on the player will work \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODSwiftExplainText:AddMessage("\n If enabled emergency swiftmend will cast ONLY on you (Emergency swiftmend must still be enabled) \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODSwiftExplainText:AddMessage("\n Click here to create a moveable bar that changes the position of all Swiftmend Bars \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
AsmoMODSwiftExplainText:AddMessage("\n Click here to reset the Swiftmend Bars to their default position \n", 156/256, 212/256, 1.0 );
